Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Good afternoon, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan strolls up to the meeting point, flashing a smile and reaching out his hand.'}
{2: '(Return the handshake)', 3: '9'}
{3: 'And off you go, wandering the commercial streets, shooting the breeze like always.'}
{2: "Noticed you scoping out the shops back there. Interested in what this street's got to offer?", 3: '11'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'You bet. Looks like the ACA is in the mix, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "How'd you figure?", 3: '13'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Some of these joints scream traveling merchants or Cargo Crew.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He points to a "mixed" flower shop ahead. They\'ve got everythingâ€”fresh blooms, potted plants, and those fancy preserved flower crafts.'}

{2: 'Noan', 3: 'They collect their raw materials from specific spots, then hit up artisans to work their magic. Their stores always look like this, a mishmash of goodies but all made from the same materials.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Were you like this?', 3: '17'}

{2: 'Noan', 3: "Yeah, but flowers weren't exactly essentials, so they only traded for the bare minimum. When I was a kid, I used to sneak off to the ruins hunting for wild roses. Back then, I was just a budding merchant at heart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh, speaking of which, I bumped into some Cargo Crew folks on the way here.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Jamilah asked them to bring me some treats from Akdilek.', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Treats from Akdilek?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man who hails from Akdilek looks baffled, as if someone is wolfing down salt right in front of him.'}
{2: 'Nothing weird. See?', 3: '24'}
{3: 'Noan eyes the cloth bag in his hand and lets out a sigh of relief.'}
{2: "You haven't even opened it yet! How did you know?", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I heard the rustle when you whipped it out... and caught a whiff of that tea aroma.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You smell that from here? Are you part dog or what?', 3: '31', 4: "So, is this a merchant's instinct?", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Most traveling merchants aren't as honest and friendly, and if you're not careful, you could end up with your goods swapped out... It's a survival skill.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As he speaks, Noan pauses in front of a jewelry shop.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "This place isn't half bad.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He bends down, examining the jewelry on the counter and pondering hard on what to buy as a gift.'}
{2: 'You can swap that commemorative coin for a freebie. Let me hook you up.', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Alright, if that's how it is...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He casually grabs a metal bookmark crafted from an old gear.'}
{2: 'Feel like you might already have something similar, though.', 3: '39'}
{2: "It's a rare shot. Why not go for something more unique?", 3: '40', 4: "You're not a merchant here, you're a guest. Pick something special.", 5: '40'}
{3: 'He scans the shop again and, after a beat, snatches up a pair of earrings.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'How about these?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I didn't know you're an earring person...", 3: '44', 4: 'Seems quite special, no?', 5: '44', 6: 'These are seriously something else.', 7: '45'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Since it's a rare chance, I figured I'd try something new... If you're not feeling it, we can switch back to the bookmark?", 4: '1'}
{2: "But you don't have your ears pierced, do you?", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Do Constructs even need to stress about that stuff?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's like a minor upgrade, right?", 3: '50', 4: 'Piercings require extra attention.', 5: '50'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Fair point... Mind giving me a hand?', 4: '1'}
